title: Trouble determining what this font style is
content:
Could you please help me determine what font style the "I" is and what font style the "nter" is. Your help would be greatly appreciated.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014075109im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Cutout%202_full_4135.jpg)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Cutout%202\_full.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014075109/http:/typophile.com/files/Cutout%202_full.jpg) | 38.48 KB |
author: dlampi

comments.content: looks like [Pepita](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014075109/http:/www.fonts.com/font/monotype/packages/handwriting-value-pack) with some backskewing applied & maybe a false boldening.
